img_above_text:
Go to the clearing behind where you fought the Son of Stones, just off to the left. You'll see some water, a large rock to the left of it, and two golden trees on either side of the rock.
You want to go to the right of the water to find the secret area that will take you to the hidden boss.
img_below_text:
You'll need to ascend quite high up, but where the path reaches a dead end, up above there's an opening in the cliff that you can pass through. Follow this until you enter an area that's slightly covered and pass through this tunnel.
![Five Skandhas \(24\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Five_Skandhas_%2824%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 81 from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "Go to the clearing behind where you fought the Son of Stones, just off to the left. You'll see some water, a large rock to the left of it, and two golden trees on either side of the rock.
You want to go to the right of the water to find the secret area that will take you to the hidden boss."
            - Following Text: "You'll need to ascend quite high up, but where the path reaches a dead end, up above there's an opening in the cliff that you can pass through. Follow this until you enter an area that's slightly covered and pass through this tunnel.
![Five Skandhas \(24\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/82/Five_Skandhas_%2824%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a dark, forested mountainous area with a character, likely the protagonist, hovering on a cloud in the foreground. A red arrow is overlaid on the image, pointing toward a cliffside opening, suggesting the intended direction or path to progress.

2. **Purpose, Content, or Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the hidden path mentioned in the preceding and following text. It highlights the specific cliffside opening that players need to ascend toward in order to continue exploring the secret area and eventually reach the hidden boss.
